mapper.sql: SELECT B.BF_NO, B.USER_NO, B.BF_TITLE, B.BF_PRICE, B.BF_ENROLL_DATE, B.BF_END_DATE, B.BF_MODIFY_DATE, B.BF_REMAIN_DATE, B.BF_TARGET_PRICE, B.BF_REACH_PRICE, B.BF_ATTAIN_RATE, B.BF_VIEW_COUNT, B.BF_BUY_COUNT, B.BF_STATUS, B.BF_AGREEMENT, B.BF_LIKE, B.BF_CONTENT, B.BF_ORI_IMGNAME, B.BF_RE_IMGNAME, B.BF_ADMIN_COMMENT FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BF_STATUS='P'

SELECT BF_NO, USER_NO, BF_TITLE, BF_PRICE, BF_ENROLL_DATE, BF_END_DATE, BF_MODIFY_DATE, BF_REMAIN_DATE, BF_TARGET_PRICE, BF_REACH_PRICE, BF_ATTAIN_RATE, BF_VIEW_COUNT, BF_BUY_COUNT, BF_STATUS, BF_AGREEMENT, BF_LIKE, BF_CONTENT, BF_ORI_IMGNAME, BF_RE_IMGNAME, BF_ADMIN_COMMENT FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B WHERE B.BF_STATUS='P'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD SET BF_ATTAIN_RATE = CEIL((BF_REACH_PRICE/BF_TARGET_PRICE)*100), BF_REMAIN_DATE = TRUNC(BF_END_DATE - SYSDATE)
UPDATE BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD SET BF_STATUS = 'Q' WHERE BF_REMAIN_DATE < 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD VALUES( SEQ_BF_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{bfTitle}, #{bfPrice}, #{bfEnrollDate}, #{bfEndDate}, DEFAULT, NULL, #{bfTargetPrice}, 0, 0, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 'Y', DEFAULT, #{bfContent}, #{bfOriImgName}, #{bfReImgName}, NULL )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD
WHERE BF_STATUS =#{status}

SELECT F.BF_NO, F.BF_TITLE, F.BF_RE_IMGNAME FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD F JOIN PAYMENT P ON(F.BF_NO = P.BF_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.PAY_PROGRESS = 'Y' AND P.PAY_ITEM = 'F' AND P.PAY_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY BF_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD F JOIN PAYMENT P ON(F.BF_NO = P.BF_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.PAY_PROGRESS = 'Y' AND P.PAY_ITEM = 'F' AND P.PAY_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT BF_NO, BF_TITLE, BF_RE_IMGNAME, BF_STATUS FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY BF_NO DESC

SELECT B.BF_NO, B.USER_NO, B.BF_TITLE, B.BF_PRICE, B.BF_ENROLL_DATE, B.BF_END_DATE, B.BF_MODIFY_DATE, B.BF_REMAIN_DATE, B.BF_TARGET_PRICE, B.BF_REACH_PRICE, B.BF_ATTAIN_RATE, B.BF_VIEW_COUNT, B.BF_BUY_COUNT, B.BF_STATUS, B.BF_AGREEMENT, B.BF_LIKE, B.BF_CONTENT, B.BF_ORI_IMGNAME, B.BF_RE_IMGNAME, B.BF_ADMIN_COMMENT FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BF_NO=#{bfNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD SET BF_VIEW_COUNT = (BF_VIEW_COUNT + 1) WHERE BF_NO = #{bfNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B WHERE B.BF_STATUS='P' AND B.BF_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BF_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY B.BF_TITLE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B WHERE B.BF_STATUS='P' AND B.BF_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BF_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY B.BF_CONTENT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B WHERE B.BF_STATUS='Q'

SELECT B.BF_NO, B.USER_NO, B.BF_TITLE, B.BF_PRICE, B.BF_ENROLL_DATE, B.BF_END_DATE, B.BF_MODIFY_DATE, B.BF_REMAIN_DATE, B.BF_TARGET_PRICE, B.BF_REACH_PRICE, B.BF_ATTAIN_RATE, B.BF_VIEW_COUNT, B.BF_BUY_COUNT, B.BF_STATUS, B.BF_AGREEMENT, B.BF_LIKE, B.BF_CONTENT, B.BF_ORI_IMGNAME, B.BF_RE_IMGNAME, B.BF_ADMIN_COMMENT FROM BOOK_FUNDING_BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.BF_STATUS='Q' ORDER BY B.BF_REMAIN_DATE DESC
